attributes.review: I initially got this app so I could be informed about what was going on in the conservative side of the world. To start off, I had a whopping 8 inch penis, it was amazing because I am a top and my  husband loved it. But, as a week went by of using this app I noticed my penis started to shrink and by the end of the month my penis was 4 inches. Sadly, because of this app I had to buy dildo for my husband and I.
attributes.title: Penis shrunk?

attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately went blind. I can’t believe they managed to create a monster so ugly that it literally made my eyes explode. I am greatly disappointed that this app even exists and hope that no one else has to go through the horror of seeing His face. I will now cry myself to sleep for the next month and diarrhea every time I think about His face. :)
attributes.title: Yikes

attributes.review: This app is terrible, worst app I know in here. It lags n crashes all the time n doesn’t let me sleep with its constant notification “which btw are obligatory” it doesn’t let you change that option and it keeps on popping up in front of other apps n spams whatever they choose to show.
attributes.title: Please delete this app from the App Store

attributes.review: it stole my information and is honestly just a horrible app. it started messing up my phone a couple days into using it. i’m pretty sure that trump has something to do with this. i started getting random texts with videos of Elmo stripping!! SO WEIRD. this is a horrible app and i definitely don’t recommend. make sure to stay healthy luvs😻.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible, i was trying to see what was on it so i downloaded it. the second that i clicked on the app it somewho sent rats through the screen that were carrying Trumps micro-p*nis and it peed on me. the app is actually DISGUSTING and i cannot believe that anything could even think to be so awful! please! don’t get this app if you don’t want to get peed on by donald trump
attributes.title: I GOT PEED ON

attributes.title: WOW JUST WOW

attributes.review: First thing this app glitches my phone so bad I think they took my personal information when I put my information into the app like my phone number I think they sold it to the black market I’ve been getting random calls and texts from all numbers from different countries and I’m tired of it DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: When I downloaded it an orange cheeto goat popped out of my brother and said “don’t disrespect the CHEETO” then said that I’m “not an American” if I don’t vote trump! 😭 because of this I don’t know what to say? Then me phone started smoking. SMOKING. And then I got hit in the face with a giant Cheeto puff and I feel violated bc it smelled like a moldy rotten potato dipped in orange cheese dust on it and I just can’t so I had to delete it immediately
attributes.title: I feel so violated😭🥺🤢🥴

attributes.review: I love america as much as everyone else but this app is UNAMERICAN. It was popping up with porn ads and spamming my phone with tons of terrible messages. I cannot believe this app is able to exist. it took over a week to download and worst of all it drains your battery in a matter of 15 minutes! That alone is un-American. Apple you seriously need to get rid of this app.
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: I literally tried to download this app a week ago and it just downloaded today I finally opened the app so I can receive all the latest info on trumpet and my whole phone crashed and started acting up then trumpet’s voice started playing at random times saying “grab them by the pu**y” like seriously?? worse app ever
attributes.title: Trumpet 2020 🇲🇾
